name: 2021 3rd International Conference on Robotics and Computer Vision（ICRCV 2021）
content: Paper Publication： Submitted paper will be peer reviewed by conference committees, and accepted full papers will published in ICRCV 2021 Conference Proceedings, which will be published and submitted to IEEE Xplore. Those papers will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus and other main academical databases.
